original_text: When a fool does any work, he quickly becomes tired. He is so tired that he forgets the way to town. When a fool does any work, he quickly becomes tired. He is so tired that he forgets the way to town. When a fool does any work, he quickly becomes tired. He is so tired that he forgets the way to town. When a fool does any work,
korean_text: 우매한 자들의 수고는 자신을 피곤하게 할 뿐이라 그들은 성읍에 들어갈 줄도 알지 못함이니라

sentences.original_text: When a fool does any work
